A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Never written a review until now. I'll try and keep it short. Terrible script\, awkward interactions between characters\, plot line has more gaps than a badly dubbed kung-fu movie\, bad special affects\, awkward musical score placement\, underwhelming action scenes\, stock-photo type character development\, visually underwhelming\, and they somehow made Luke Skywalker\, LUKE SKYWALKER\, look like a whinning weaping bitch. A fourth grader could direct a better movie and it cost $600\,000\,000+. Theres no hope\, the dark side won. Sorry Mark Hamilton\, I see now why you were pissed.
